Articles.Content: I know you get plenty of praise on your work when something is completed, but I rarely see any praise when you constantly keep your mod updated. I know switching over to a new version can be tedious work, especially if you have more mods than you do fingers to keep up with. I know plenty of other people feel the same way, but are too busy using your mods in game to say thanks, so I will say thanks for them. Thank you Modders! You make our KSP experience something we can build from our childhood imaginations come true.
Agreed. Mods add such much richness and diversity to this game.
Since this was in the off-topic lounge, talking about KSP is off-topic there. The thread has been moved to the modding subforum, where it is on-topic.
